item.title: 新对冲基金押注日本市场复兴获支持
item.description: 总部位于香港的森谷资本有限公司（Sengu Capital Ltd.）正在利用日本金融市场复苏的契机，成立一家新的对冲基金，专注于改善日本的企业管理。【原文：Hong Kong-based Sengu Capital Ltd. is starting a new hedge fund focused on improving corporate management in Japan, tapping into the country’s financial market revival.】

item.title: 日元走强、美国就业数据疲软，日本股市将下跌
item.description: 在令人失望的美国就业数据加剧了人们对世界最大经济体健康状况的担忧之后，日元升值对出口商的盈利前景构成了压力，日本股票期货下跌。【原文：Japanese stock futures fell as the yen’s advance weighed on the earnings outlook for exporters after disappointing US jobs data fueled concern about the health of the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第二大养老金公司增持新西兰电力公司股份：报道
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》（Australian Financial Review）报道，管理着超过 3000 亿澳元（约合 2030 亿美元）资金的澳大利亚第二大养老基金--澳大利亚退休信托基金（Australian Retirement Trust）增持了新西兰能源分销商 Powerco Ltd. 的股份，成为该公司的最大股东。【原文：Australian Retirement Trust, the nation’s second-largest pension fund with more than A$300 billion ($203 billion) under management, has increased its stake in New Zealand’s energy distributor Powerco Ltd. to become the largest shareholder, according to a report in the Australian Financial Review.】

item.title: 就业数据和美联储讲话后亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 美国就业数据好坏参半，而美联储不置可否，这加剧了人们对央行可能已经等了太久才降息的担忧，亚洲股市将因此下跌。【原文：Asian stocks are set to drop after mixed US jobs data and a noncommittal Federal Reserve added to concerns the central bank may have waited too long to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 特拉维斯-斯科特、萨布丽娜-卡朋特和音乐排行榜的黑暗艺术
item.description:
斯科特说他被夺走了一张冠军专辑。卡朋特夺得了桂冠。【原文：

Scott says he was robbed of a No. 1 album. Carpenter claimed the crown.

】

item.title: 舒默警告政府将在 9 月 30 日截止日期前关门
item.description: 参议院多数党领袖查克-舒默（Chuck Schumer）强调了避免政府在 9 月 30 日关门的重要性，因为议员们将在 8 月休会后返回华盛顿，而美国大选将在 11 月举行。【原文：Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer emphasized the importance of avoiding a government shutdown on Sept. 30, as lawmakers return to Washington after the August break with the US election ahead in November.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉的镇压运动让马杜罗短期内如愿以偿
item.description: 尼古拉斯-马杜罗如愿以偿。暂时如此。【原文：Nicolás Maduro has gotten what he wants. For now.】

item.title: 苹果如何统治世界
item.description: 这家世界上最有价值的公司因其对 iPhone 的狂热控制而令人又爱又怕。这种情况还能持续多久？【原文：The world’s most valuable company is loved, and feared, because of the fanatical control it maintains over the iPhone. How long can that last?】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 对冲基金正在削减对石油反弹的押注。随着中国钢材价格的下跌，铁矿石呈下降趋势。在巴西，生物燃料比石油更受青睐。【原文：Hedge funds are slashing bets on an oil rally amid a rout. Iron ore is on a downward trend as declines for steel prices in China bite. And biofuels are getting a boost over oil in Brazil.】

item.title: Zelis 所有者正在商谈以 170 亿美元的价值出售股权
item.description: 知情人士透露，贝恩资本（Bain Capital）和帕特农资本（Parthenon Capital）正在洽谈出售 Zelis 少数股权的交易，该交易可能使这家医疗保健技术公司的估值达到约 170 亿美元。【原文：Bain Capital and Parthenon Capital are in talks to sell a minority stake in Zelis in a transaction that could value the health-care technology company at about $17 billion, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 首席财务官如何博弈激烈的美国大选
item.description:
此外，SAP 的 Dominik Asam 还将介绍重组管理等内容。【原文：

Plus, SAP’s Dominik Asam on managing a restructuring and more.

】

item.title: 债券市场的反弹取决于美联储降息的速度
item.description: 曾努力预测美联储将把利率提高到多高水平的债券交易员们发现，利率下降的过程也同样令人烦恼。【原文：Bond traders who struggled to predict how high the Federal Reserve would raise interest rates are finding the way down just as vexing.】

item.title: Couche-Tard 将确认七枚印章；被拒绝后对其感兴趣
item.description: 知情人士称，Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.计划告诉 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. plans to tell Seven & i Holdings Co. that it’s still keen to pursue an acquisition, even after the Japanese convenience store operator rejected its initial proposal, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 甲壳虫汁》续集国内首映获 1.1 亿美元票房
item.description: 甲壳虫汁》（Beetlejuice）是 1988 年热门恐怖喜剧电影《甲壳虫汁》（Beetlejuice）的续集，本周末在国内的首映票房达到 1.1 亿美元，吸引了众多年轻影迷和怀念原作的观众。【原文：Beetlejuice Beetlejuice, a sequel to the 1988 spooky comedy hit movie, brought in $110 million in ticket sales in its domestic opening this weekend, drawing in younger filmgoers as well as those nostalgic about the original picture.】

item.title: 增长忧虑加剧，股市风险偏好势头受挫
item.description: 看似势不可挡的股市涨势正摇摆不定，因为它正面临着一大堆挑战，这些挑战使它的势头从历史最高纪录上升到历史最高纪录。【原文：The seemingly unstoppable stock market rally is wobbling as it confronts a horde of challenges to the momentum that’s taken it from record high to record high.】

item.title: 苹果推出人工智能的时间过于交错，难以刺激 iPhone 的 "超级周期
item.description: 苹果公司的人工智能功能不断推迟推出，这很可能意味着 iPhone 16 不会出现 "超级周期 "订单。还有：周一 iPhone 16 发布会的一切期待；Sonos 因面临应用程序危机而推迟推出 Roku 风格产品；iPhone 16 上市第二天，苹果可能被罚款数十亿美元。【原文：Apple’s AI features keep getting delayed — and that slow rollout likely means that the iPhone 16 won’t see a “super cycle” of orders. Also: Everything to expect from the phone’s launch event on Monday; Sonos delays its Roku-style product as it contends with an app crisis; and Apple could be fined billions the day after the iPhone 16 debut.】

item.title: 9 月借贷狂潮凸显新兴市场恐慌情绪
item.description: 发展中国家的借款人正在加强防御，以应对可能动摇其最大的美国市场并破坏再融资计划的波动。【原文：Borrowers in the developing world are shoring up their defenses against volatility that could shake their biggest markets in the US and derail refinancing plans.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行命令英国员工每周三天返回办公室
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）的英国员工将不得不每周在办公室度过相当于三天的时间，因为这家西班牙银行禁止远程办公。【原文：Banco Santander SA’s UK employees will have to spend the equivalent of three days a week in the office, as the Spanish-owned bank clamps down on remote working.】

item.title: 据《Il Sole》报道，意大利明年经济增长目标为 1.3%-1.4
item.description: 据《Il Sole 24 Ore》报报道，意大利明年的经济增长目标为 1.3%-1.4%，但该报并未说明从何处获得这一信息。【原文：Italy is targeting economic growth of 1.3%-1.4% next year, Il Sole 24 Ore newspaper reported, without saying where it got the information.】

item.title: 欧洲奢侈品股的 2400 亿美元之路才刚刚开始
item.description: 近几个月来，欧洲奢侈品公司的市值遭受了近 25 万亿美元的重创，随着中国经济衰退的加剧，它们在股市上的影响力可能会进一步减弱。【原文：After enduring almost a quarter-trillion dollar hit to their market value in recent months, Europe’s luxury firms may see their stock-market clout wane further as China’s downturn worsens.】

item.title: 伊朗否认向俄罗斯提供弹道导弹的报道
item.description: 伊朗否认向俄罗斯提供弹道导弹的报道，称伊朗没有向俄乌战争中的任何一方提供军事支持。【原文：Iran denied reports it supplied Russia with ballistic missiles, saying it doesn’t provide military support to either side in the Russia-Ukraine war.】

item.title: 泰国新总理巴吞吞将优先解决 4740 亿美元的家庭债务问题
item.description: 泰国新政府计划加快全面的债务重组，以解决约 4,740 亿美元的家庭债务，为小企业提供财政援助，并加快财政刺激措施以促进经济增长。【原文：Thailand’s new government plans to expedite a sweeping debt restructuring to tackle an estimated $474 billion of household liability, offer financial assistance to small businesses and accelerate fiscal stimulus to lift growth.】

item.title: 中国进一步向外资开放医疗保健行业
item.description: 中国宣布了一系列进一步向外国投资者开放医疗保健行业的政策，为振兴世界第二大经济体的努力添砖加瓦。【原文：China announced a slew of policies to further open up its health care sector to foreign investors, adding to efforts to revive the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 新加坡将于 2025 年开始建设樟宜 T5 大型机场航站楼
item.description: 新加坡总理黄遵宪表示，新加坡将于明年上半年开始在樟宜机场建设一个新的大型航站楼，目标是将这个航空枢纽的年旅客吞吐量提高一半以上。【原文：Singapore will start construction of a new mega terminal at Changi Airport in the first half of next year, aiming to lift the aviation hub’s annual passenger handling capacity by more than half, Prime Minister Lawrence Wong said.】

item.title: 新加坡的石油派对被油价下跌和中国阴霾破坏
item.description: 石油狂欢还未结束；但对于本周聚集在新加坡参加会谈和屋顶鸡尾酒会的顶级商人和高管来说，近年来超额利润带来的亢奋情绪正在迅速消退。【原文：The oil party isn’t over yet — but for top merchants and executives gathering for talks and rooftop cocktails in Singapore this week, the exuberance that came with the outsized profits of recent years is quickly fading.】

item.title: 特朗普承诺对避开美元的国家征收 "100%关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周六承诺，将使各国放弃使用美元的成本过高，这为他的关税政纲增添了新的支柱。【原文：Donald Trump pledged on Saturday to make it too costly for countries to shift away from using the US dollar, adding a new pillar to his tariff platform.】

item.title: 欧洲央行准备再次降息为美联储热身
item.description: 随着全球货币周期向更同步的宽松政策倾斜，欧洲央行可能会在周四降息，为下周美国的降息行动做铺垫。【原文：The European Central Bank will probably cut interest rates on Thursday in a prelude to a US move the following week, as the global monetary cycle tilts toward more synchronized easing.】

item.title: 信用周报》：CLO 权益持有人重置交易的速度创下新高
item.description: 由于有史以来最大规模的重置浪潮，抵押贷款债务中风险最高部分的投资者正看到他们的回报得到提高。【原文：Investors in the riskiest portions of collateralized loan obligations are seeing their returns get juiced thanks to the biggest wave of resetting on record.】

item.title: 耶伦表示欢迎中国同行来访
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，她欢迎中国财政部长访问美国，并对她本人再次访问中国持开放态度，她强调了世界上两个最大经济体相互接触的重要性。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said that she would welcome a visit to the US by her Chinese counterpart, and is open to another visit of her own to China, as she underscored the importance of the world’s two largest economies engaging with each other.】

item.title: 意大利希望撤销欧盟 2035 年内燃机禁令计划
item.description: 意大利能源部长表示，应重新审议欧盟关于从 2035 年起禁止销售新型内燃机的有效禁令。【原文：Italy’s energy minister said the European Union’s effective ban on sales of new internal combustion engines from 2035 should be reviewed.】
